Package deco2800.thomas.util

Class WorldUtil

java.lang.Object
deco2800.thomas.util.WorldUtil
public class WorldUtil
extends java.lang.Object
A utility class for the World instances. Created by BradleyKing on 15/6/18.

  • Method Details

    • screenToWorldCoordinates

      public static float[] screenToWorldCoordinates​(float x, float y)
      Converts screen coordinates to world coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate on the screen
      y - the y coordinate on the screen
      Returns:
      a float array of the world coordinates

    • worldCoordinatesToColRow

      public static float[] worldCoordinatesToColRow​(float x, float y)

    • colRowToWorldCords

      public static float[] colRowToWorldCords​(float col, float row)
      Same function as above, but returns a primitive type. Much faster for rendering.
      Parameters:
      col - coordinate column
      row - coordinate row
      Returns:
      a float array containing the world coordinates

    • validColRow

      public static boolean validColRow​(SquareVector pos)

    • isWalkable

      public static boolean isWalkable​(float col, float row)
      Determines if the position is safe to walk on or place machines on.
      Parameters:
      col - the x coordinate of a position
      row - the y coordinate of a position
      Returns:
      A boolean stating if the position is safe to walk on.

    • areCoordinatesOffScreen

      public static boolean areCoordinatesOffScreen​(float squareX, float squareY, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)

    • closestWalkable

      public static SquareVector closestWalkable​(SquareVector startLocation)
      Attempts to find the closest Walkable tile to a location. NO LOGGING BECAUSE OF HORRENDOUS SPAM
      Parameters:
      startLocation - the location of a tile to start the search
      Returns:
      a location of a walkable tile or null if none where found
